name: Tayl's Tales
description:
This is a very early beginning to some Taylspin inspired video game shenanigans.

Currently we have just one (incomplete) mini game for our boy Laserbeamzz to smash away the haunting game of minesweeper in time to ease his suffering.

There will be much much more to come! Stay tuned!

Controls:
WASD/ARROWS - Move
Shift/Right Click - Roll
Left Click - Attack
Z - Toggle Zoom
R - random weapon
F11 - Full Screen
ESC - Menu

Written in Go using Ebiten.
